title: Donald Trump Boasts of Inciting Hatred Against Innocent Central Park Jogger Defendants | Opinion - Liberal
text:
(Before It's News)
a katz / Shutterstock.com So today, Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump retweeted this, from bigoted right wing bomb thrower Ann Coulter: “@AnnCoulter: Read this DJT full-p ad from 1989 and tell me DonaldTrump is a Johnny-Come-Lately “fake” conservative: pic.twitter.com/DBNIc3MIOl — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) October 18, 2015 This advertisement from 1989 …
